question:
26. Ati karep bandha cupet.    Ukara kasebut kalebu purwakanthi ....
A. Purwakanthi guru swara
B Purwakanthi guru sastra
C. Purwakanthi lumaksita
D. Purwakanthi guru wilangan​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

curlier

Penjelasan:

Comparative (Perbandingan)

Kata kunci perbandingan itu ada di kata "than",yang artinya daripada. Bentuk comparative dari curly adalah curlier (kalau diakhiri dengan y, ganti y dengan i lalu tambah er). Semoga membantu!

Jawaban:

The teacher gave some work yesterday

Penjelasan:

Karena kata give nya di kurung jadi saya pikir harus diubah menjadi past tense ^^

Semoga bermanfaat ^^

-Lily ✨

Jawaban:

The teacher gave some works yesterday

Penjelasan:

Kita menggunakan past tense jika waktu sudah lewat, misal nya I ate this food yesterday, otomatis kan sudh kemarin jadi pakai pas tense

Maaf kalau salah yaa\

-Clarissa

related_questions.question:
Binder Note High a    Penguin is aquatic, flightless bird. Most of their species live in cold climates area. They have
adapted to live in cold climates.
Penguins have to keep body temperatures high to remain active. They have thick skin and lots of
fat (blubber) under their skin to keep warm in cold weather.
They also huddle together with their friends to keep warm. Emperor penguins have developed a
social behavior that when it gets cold, they huddle together in groups that may comprise several
thousand penguins.
The dark colored feathers of a penguin's back surface absorb heat from the sun. It also keeps
them to warm up too.
Penguins tightly packed feathers overlap to provide waterproofing and warmth. They coat their
feathers with oil from a gland near the tail to increase impermeability. Waterproofing is critical to
5. From the text we know that...
A. penguin fats help them absorb the heat from sun
B. penguins huddle together during mating season
C. penguins can swim faster by coating their feather with oil
D. penguin fats protect them from cold
E. penguins' beaks are waterproof​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

D. penguin fats protect them from cold

related_questions.question:
1.0.4e1.nwisition    ose the correct answer by putting a cross (X) on the letter A, B, C, or
D. Toe
My sister has a ring, she uses it on her
A. Neck
B. Hand
C. Finger
Mrs. Ririn explain how to make a handcraft to her students. She is a...
A. Arts teacher
C. Science teacher
B. English teacher
D. Math teacher
1
/2021 K.13 - B. INGGRIS Kls. 5​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

OCTOGENARIAN PROTEST  

Pensioner Maude Jennings I. celebrated her eightieth birthday outside Avonhurst Town yesterday. She was one of a large group who 2. protests against the plans for a tunnel under the River Severn. Maude's tiny cottage may 3. be demolished when new roads to the tunnel 4. are built. Maude was born in the cottage, which 5. was built in the 18th century, and the entrance of the tunnel will be built at the ends of her garden. Maude /. consulted our reporter, 'I 8. have been told by the planners, and I 9. will never leave my lovely home. I 10. have lived there for eighty years!  

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan menggunakan bentuk Simple Past Tense, Simple Present Tense, Present Perfect Tense, Simple Future Tense, Modal Verbs dan Passive Voice.

Simple Past Tense:

Nominal: (+) Subject + Tobe (was/were) + Adjective

Verbal: (+) Subject + Verb-2 + Object

Passive: (+) Subject + Tobe (was/were) + Verb-3

Simple Present Tense:

Verbal: (+) Subject + Verb-1 S/ES + Object

Passive: (+) Subject + Tobe (is/am/are) + Verb-3

Present Perfect Tense

(+) Subject + Have/Has + Verb-3

Simple Future Tense:

(+) Subject + Will + Verb-1 + Object

Modal Verbs:

Active: (+) Subject + Modal Verbs (May/Will) + Verb-1 + Object

Passive: (+) Subject + Modal Verbs (May/Will) + Be + Verb-3

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question: Johan has Rp. 345.000,-,Anlsa has Rp 155.000,- and Dono has Rp. 275.000, We can say that Johannes    .........money of all.​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

We can say that Johannes had more money of all

related_questions.question:
Bludy    Teks for question number 11 to 15
Keisha visited Aunt Vicky last holiday. Aunt vicky brought her to Ancol. It was a beautiful day. Aunt vicky's
daughter, Farah begged Keisha to build a giant sand castle. Keisha took picture their sand castle and uploaded in her
Instagram. Aunt Vicky told her it was too hot to play at the beach without a hat on. Keisha didn't bring her hat. Aunt
Vicky told her not to worry, she could wear one of hers.
Keisha tried on two hats. The pink one was really pretty, but it had a long pink ribbon on its back and it was too big
for her. The blue hat was so fancy but it was too small, it was her niece's hat. Keisha had no other choice, she had to wear
it to avoid the sun light so she chose the pink one. Even though it was too big for her but she didn't care.
Suddenly, there was big wind blew away her hat, her pink hat flew out to the seashore. We laughed at her. She ran away
and tried to catch the hat but it was so hard. She jumped every time the small wave came to her. Finally, she gave up and
let the hat gone away and asked her muin to buy the new one.
11. Where was Keisha?
A. at the hotel
B. at the beach
C. at the castle
D. at aunt vicky's house​

answers.answer:
bludy
Teks for question number 11 to 15
Keisha visited Aunt Vicky last holiday. Aunt vicky brought her to Ancol. It was a beautiful day. Aunt vicky's
daughter, Farah begged Keisha to build a giant sand castle. Keisha took picture their sand castle and uploaded in her
Instagram. Aunt Vicky told her it was too hot to play at the beach without a hat on. Keisha didn't bring her hat. Aunt
Vicky told her not to worry, she could wear one of hers.
Keisha tried on two hats. The pink one was really pretty, but it had a long pink ribbon on its back and it was too big
for her. The blue hat was so fancy but it was too small, it was her niece's hat. Keisha had no other choice, she had to wear
it to avoid the sun light so she chose the pink one. Even though it was too big for her but she didn't care.
Suddenly, there was big wind blew away her hat, her pink hat flew out to the seashore. We laughed at her. She ran away
and tried to catch the hat but it was so hard. She jumped every time the small wave came to her. Finally, she gave up and
let the hat gone away and asked her muin to buy the new one.
11. Where was Keisha?


C. at the castle

Jawaban:

D. at aunt vicky's house

Penjelasan:

Keisha visited Aunt Vicky last holiday.

semoga membantu

related_questions.question:
3. Ubah kata yang ada di dalam kurung sehingga menjadi conditional sentence type III yang benar!

“If we (know) about that earlier, we (not come) here.”
_
inappropriate answer will be reported, thank ya ~​

answers.answer:
Conditional Sentence Type 3 adalah suatu kondisi dimana suatu hal sudah tidak memungkinkan lagi untuk terjadi dikarenakan waktu kejadian sudah melampaui batas.

Contohnya : If you had remembered to invite me, I would have attended your party.

Rumus Conditional Sentence Type 3 :

If + Past Perfect + Would + Have + Past Participle.

Perubahan kata diatas menjadi Conditional Sentence Type 3 adalah :

If we had Known about that earlier, We Would'nt Have Come here.

related_questions.question:
Simple Present Formula    (+) Subject + to be (am, is, are) + verbl+o/e
- Subject + to be (am, is, are) + pot+verbl+ole
(?) To be (am, is, are) + subject tverbl+o/c
Complete the sentences below with (+), (-) and (?) by looking at the formula above
6. (-) Linda is not a teacher
(Score 15)​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

(+) Linda is a teacher

(?) is Linda a teacher?
